Articles.Content: Has anyone noticed the center of mass for the rapier engine is 2 meters in front of the part with the latest update?

Yes, and that's the same for all the jet engines since at least 1.0. It's because there is no model for the engine's turbine (they briefly added one in 1.0, but it was removed in 1.0.5), but since the turbine is supposed to be there it offsets the CoM forwards.

More info: https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/index.php?/topic/124423-the-new-longer-jet-engine-models/

(Very useful to lower the CoM of rovers, to prevent unplanned flipping.)
